This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS A button can't be modal 
PASS An ARIA dialog with aria-modal false is not modal 
PASS An ARIA dialog with aria-modal true is modal 
PASS An ARIA alertdialog with aria-modal true is modal 
PASS An HTML dialog is modal after calling showModal() on it 
PASS A closed HTML dialog has no accessibility node 
PASS An open HTML dialog is not modal 
PASS An open HTML dialog with aria-modal=true is modal 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
